text: ll activation, but those who carry this matrix (contained within the cellular material you currently call junk DNA) have the potential ability of accelerated evolution. They possess within their genetic makeup the latent ability to transmute cellular structure, which will one day allow them to traverse the time portals and interdimensional passageways without deterioration of their biological form. Though there are other teaching races that have had similar involvement with the human populace, none of these possessed the genetic combinations needed to allow for this advancement in human biology. Those carrying this strain have a predisposition to multidimensional perception, interdimensional communication and UFO abductions of the Soul agreement kind. The Zionites are working from your future as well as from your past, leading their chosen ones to the fulfillment of their genetic imprint, through which these humans will assist in setting the codes for the advanced evolution of the species. Though the Zeta were in part responsible for the creation of this master race, many of them now live in fear of them. Their “children” became far more wise and powerful than the Zeta themselves, and went on to join interstellar groups far beyond the scope of the Zeta's perceptions.
